hero.title: High-Quality Urban Real Estate Development
hero.subtitle: We create exceptional spaces with first-class infrastructure and services, strategically located to enhance your quality of life

about.title: Background
about.description1: Since 2010, INMOVILIA has established itself as a leading company in high-quality urban real estate development. We specialize in creating spaces that enhance our clients' quality of life.
about.description2: Our focus is on developing strategically located projects with first-class infrastructure and services, ensuring solid and sustainable investments for our clients.

proposal.title: Our Real Estate Proposal
proposal.subtitle: INMOVILIA S.A. de C.V. was created with the vision of developing urban projects to efficiently meet our clients' needs. We focus on two main aspects to offer the best real estate solution.

ownDevelopments.title: Own Developments
ownDevelopments.description: We create urban developments with existing infrastructure and services, ensuring the best quality of life for our clients.

strategicLocation.title: Strategic Location
strategicLocation.description: Our developments feature easily accessible roads and transportation, with location being one of our key differentiators.

efficientResponse.title: Efficient Response
efficientResponse.description: We focus on providing an efficient response to our clients' needs through well-planned developments.

supplyGeneration.title: Supply Generation
supplyGeneration.description: We develop projects within existing residential areas and zones, taking advantage of existing infrastructure.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To be the leading company in comprehensive service to our clients, investors, and strategic partners in real estate developments, to achieve complete satisfaction and trust, based on an experienced team of industry professionals.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be recognized as the leading company in urban real estate development, characterized by quality, innovation, and commitment to our clients.

team.title: Who Makes Up INMOVILIA
team.subtitle: A team of professionals with extensive experience in the real estate sector

director.name: Mario Danilo Elizondo Lomelí
director.description: Mechanical-Electrical Engineer with over 25 years of experience in real estate. Former National Operations Director for a housing company with annual production of 15,000 homes, Regional Director of the Guadalajara Metropolitan Area for Urbi.

finance.name: Octavio Javalera Espinoza
finance.description: Certified Public Accountant with a Master's in Financial Administration, 24 years of experience in the construction and real estate sector, serving as Plaza Controller and Director of Administration and Finance.

construction.name: Antonio Cuevas Pichardo
construction.description: Civil Engineer with over 20 years of experience as Construction Manager with more than 5,000 homes built throughout his professional career, currently serving as Construction Manager.

legal.name: Sergio Ramírez Aparicio
legal.description: Attorney with over 20 years of experience, working in the private sector as a trial lawyer and representative of Dinámica Desarrollos Sustentables SA de CV and currently in the private sector as a trial lawyer providing services to different real estate groups including INMOVILIA.
